QuestData.Title: Illusions Of The Past
QuestData.Description: $C, I need your strength to eliminate the Shan'ze Illusionists on Shan'ze Dao, to the northwest.$B$BIt wearies me to ask of you this difficult task.$B$BThe illusionists are among the strongest of the Shan'ze's elite sorcerors.$B$BThey will not be easy to defeat, but I know no $c who is better suited to the task.
